cmb:
MANA COST: 110/120/130/140
COOLDOWN: 14/13/12/11
desc: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
notes:
Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook hits invisible units.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
name: pudge_meat_hook

desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
notes:
Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
Rot hits invisible units.
If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
Pudge can deny himself with this ability.
lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
name: pudge_rot

attrib:
MAGIC RESISTANCE: 6% / 8% / 10% / 12%
STRENGTH BONUS: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5
RANGE: 450
desc: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
name: pudge_flesh_heap

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 75 / 125 / 175
SCEPTER STRENGTH MULTIPLIER: 1
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/130/170
COOLDOWN: 30
desc:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them.
If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
name: pudge_dismember
